comments:
More specifically, it looks to crash at "{". I think I did not this problem in 
the previous drivers (before 05/06).

This is the content of a sample plugin.xml:

   <extension point="com.ibm.etools.xsd.codegen.java_generator">
      <generator 
          name="%_GENERATOR_NAME" 
          class="com.ibm.etools.xsd.codegen.sdo.SDOGenerator"
          arguments="-dest ${output_dir};-pkg ${pkg}"
          runtime_jars="${org.eclipse.emf.ecore.sdo}/runtime/ecore.sdo.jar"/>
   </extension> 

I copied the stack trace below:
